features.featureDescription: Customer Lockbox can be used for Microsoft support access.
features.featureGuidance: In support scenarios where Microsoft needs to access your data, use Customer Lockbox to review, then approve or reject each of Microsoft's data access requests.
features.customerActionsDescription: Determine access process for cloud provider support
